page.title: 12Wallace Hall Academy.
page.content: The secondary school is a large building which was completed in 1979. There are 48 classrooms, with special rooms for science, computers, typing, music, art, home_economics, woodwork, metalwork and P.E. There are about 40 teachers and 400 pupils. There are 18 different subjects to choose from, some of which are compulsory, and each lesson lasts 40mins.Children enter secondary school at 11 or 12 years of age and leave on their 16th birthday or older. School starts at 9.15am, has an hour off for lunch and ends at 3.50pm.There is a cafeteria where pupils choose what they want for lunch. The school assembly hall is very big and film shows, concerts, dances and parties are held in it.
